title: Baganda Traditional Attire
description: The Baganda wear the Gomesi for women and the Kanzu for men, reflecting elegance and cultural pride.

title: Karamojong Warrior Dress
description: The Karamojong are known for their bold, beaded jewelry and shukas, symbolizing strength and heritage.

title: Ankole Regal Fashion
description: Ankole attire features elegant wraps and cowhide accessories, reflecting their deep connection to cattle.

title: Basoga Cultural Dress
description: The Basoga dress in colorful Kikoyi and Gomesi, often adorned with intricate embroidery and patterns.

title: Acholi Traditional Wear
description: Acholi men wear tunics, while women adorn vibrant dresses with matching headscarves for ceremonies and dances.

title: Teso Traditional Fashion
description: The Iteso wear traditional 'Atap' dresses for women and wrapped sheets for men, often paired with beaded accessories.
